desc: The January 2024 Ballot Version is the first ballot of this implementation guide.
title: Pharmaceutical Quality (Industry)
introduction: The FHIR resource profiles specified in this implementation guide represent data in the ICH Quality Guidelines (https://www.ich.org/page/quality-guidelines). This implementation guide defines universal realm structured data elements to support structured authoring (e.g., master data; advanced analysis) for the creation and exchange of Quality information internationally.
